phrs.translation: 优生的, 优生学的, 优生学, 丁子香色酮
丁香酚, 丁香酸, 丁香油酚, 丁子香酚

sentences.sentence: If it is I will listen to doctors, the most important eugenic!
sentences.translation: 如果是我，一定会听医生的，优生最重要了！

sentences.sentence: In China, each couple is required to carry out a eugenic plan strictly.
sentences.translation: 中国要求每对夫妇都要严格执行优生计划。

sentences.sentence: In China today each couple is required to carry out a eugenic plan strictly.
sentences.translation: 在今天的中国要求每对夫妇都要严格执行优生计划。
